info.name: GitHub Diff Colorblind-Friendly
info.description: Replaces the GitHub diff colors (red/green) with colorblind-friendly alternatives (blue/yellow). Both line-diff colors and word-diff colors are modified. This style is intended for GitHub's default theme. For the "Dark Theme" (and variants), please try GitHub Diff Colorblind-Friendly (Dark Theme) instead.
info.additionalInfo: Thanks to Daniel Jake Davies for the original version (without the word-diffs): https://userstyles.org/styles/129664/github-diff-colourblind-friendly
